title: Kawaii Shooter

controls: WASD / Arrow Keys: MoveSpacebar: JumpC: CrouchLeft Shift: Run
Left-click: FireRight-click: AimG: Throw a grenadeX Key / Mouse Scroll / Number Keys: Change weapons
content.howToPlay: Click "Play" to enter the kawaii world from stage 1.Use the arrow keys to move around the map. Right-click to aim and left click to shoot at incoming Kawaii enemies.Grab coins after clearing enemies to upgrade your health, speed and jumping skills later.Complete levels to unlock new challenges and environments.After each level, don't forget to spend on your skills in the upgrade section or unlock more advanced weapons with high damage ratios.Each season in Kawaii Shooter is 9 increasingly difficult levels plus one boss fight. Conquer them all and unlock the next season.
content.developer: Kawaii Shooter was developed by FreezeNova.

fullContent: Homeâ€º First Person ShooterKawaii ShooterBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenCuteness overload sometimes may turn into a battle with foes! Kawaii Shooter is an online FPS game that takes place in an adorable world where cuteness meets action! In this whimsical landscape, cute little characters known as Kawaiis are haunted by evil spirits. Despite their lovable appearance, these Kawaiis will attack as soon as they sense your presence in their charming land. You have no option other than fending them off! Blast your way through waves of kawaii enemies! Good luck, brave shooter!ControlsMovement ControlsWASD / Arrow Keys: MoveSpacebar: JumpC: CrouchLeft Shift: RunCombat ControlsLeft-click: FireRight-click: AimG: Throw a grenadeX Key / Mouse Scroll / Number Keys: Change weaponsHow to Play Kawaii ShooterClick "Play" to enter the kawaii world from stage 1.Use the arrow keys to move around the map. Right-click to aim and left click to shoot at incoming Kawaii enemies.Grab coins after clearing enemies to upgrade your health, speed and jumping skills later.Complete levels to unlock new challenges and environments.After each level, don't forget to spend on your skills in the upgrade section or unlock more advanced weapons with high damage ratios.Each season in Kawaii Shooter is 9 increasingly difficult levels plus one boss fight. Conquer them all and unlock the next season.More Games Like ThisIf you enjoyed Kawaii Shooter, you will love You vs 100 Skibidi Toilets on OnlineGames.io! In this funny game, you battle against a wild group of Skibidi Toilets. Use your shooting skills to outsmart these silly enemies. You'll have a lot of fun trying to defeat as many Skibidi Toilets as you can. Jump into the game and see how many of those Skibidis you can take down!DeveloperKawaii Shooter was developed by FreezeNova.Game FeaturesEnjoy adorable graphics and maps filled with cute characters.Experience a fun mix of FPS mechanics and charming aesthetics.Various weapons to choose from, including shotguns, rifles, and machine guns.Upgrade your character to improve health, speed, and jump height.Level-based gameplay where you face waves of Kawaiis and exciting boss battles.Free online access where you can play anywhere on a web browser.Embed URL:https://cloud.onlinegames.io/games/2024/unity/kawaii-shooter/index-og.htmlThis article was updated on October 28, 20241 Player3DActionBattleCrazyEmbeddableFirst Person ShooterFreeFunFunnyGunShootingUnityWeapon
